name: react-node-testing
description: React and Node/Express application with separate Frontend and Backend

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd Frontend && npm install && cd ../Backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd Frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-react: cd Frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test-frontend && npm run test-backend
scripts.test-frontend: cd Frontend && npm install && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false --env=jsdom
scripts.test-react: cd Frontend && npm install && npm test -- --coverage --watchAll=false --env=jsdom
scripts.test-backend: cd Backend && npm install && npm test
scripts.test-API: cd Backend && npm install && npm test
